SCRIPT.MSCRI: ! Reading xml file and place it in one AE variable :SET &HND# = PREP_PROCESS_FILE (&AGENT#, "&UC4RB_TMC_RESPONSE#",,"COL=NONE", 'UC_LOGIN=&LOGIN#') :SET &UC4RB_TMC_FILE_CONTENT# = "" :PROCESS &HND# : SET &LINE# = GET_PROCESS_LINE(&HND#) : SET &UC4RB_TMC_FILE_CONTENT# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_TMC_FILE_CONTENT#, &LINE#) :ENDPROCESS :CLOSE_PROCESS &HND#
